definitions.body: unleavened bread, or cake(s);—abs. ´[[מ]] Le 2:5, Le 8:26 ([[אַחַת]] ´[[חַלַּת מ]]), Nu 6:19 (id.), v:Nu 6:19; usu. pl. [[מַצּוֹת]] Ex 12:15 + 44 t.; [[מַצּׂת]] Ex 12:18 + 3 t;—unleavened bread, prepared in form of [[לֶחֶם]] Ex 29:2; [[חַלָּה]] Ex 29:2 + 4 t. P; [[רקיקים]] Ex 29:2, 1Ch 23:29 + 4 t. P; [[עגּה]] Ex 12:39; used at ordinary meals (prepared hastily): ´[[אפה מ]] Ge 19:3 (J), Ex 12:39 (J), 1Sa 28:24; prob. also Ju Jdg 6:19, Jdg 6:20, Jdg 6:21, Jdg 6:21; elsewhere at sacrificial meals, e.g. ritual peace-offerings Le 2:4, Le 2:4, Le 2:5, Le 6:9, Le 7:12, Le 7:12, Le 10:12; consecration of priesthood Ex 29:2, Ex 29:2, Ex 29:2, Ex 29:23, Le 8:2, Le 8:26, Le 8:26; at peace-offering of Nazirite Nu 6:15, Nu 6:15, Nu 6:17, Nu 6:19, Nu 6:19; at Passover Ex 12:8, Nu 9:11 (all P); esp. at feast of unleavened bread [cakes] for 7 days after Passover ´[[שׁמר חג המ]] Ex 23:15 (E), Ex 34:18 (J); ´[[שׁסר מ]] Ex 12:17 (P), [[עשׂה]] ´[[מ]]([[ה]])[[חג ]] 2Ch 30:13, 2Ch 30:21, 2Ch 35:17, Ezr 6:22; ´[[בחג המ]] De 16:16, 2Ch 8:13; ´[[לי]] ´[[חג המ]] Le 23:6. During these seven days all Israel ate [[מחות]] Ex 12:15, Ex 12:18, Ex 12:20 (P), Ex 23:15 (E), Ex 13:6, Ex 13:7, Ex 34:18 (J), Le 23:6, Nu 28:17 (P), De 16:3, De 16:8, Jos 5:11, Ez Eze 45:21.—2Ki 23:9 rd. prob. [[מִחְוֹת]] or [[מִנׇיוֹת]] for MT ´[[מ]] ([[אכל]]); so Gei Kue Kmp Bu.
